TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultHttpHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler, class System.Web.IHttpHandler
type DefaultHttpHandler = class interface IHttpAsyncHandler interface IHttpHandler

summary.span: 表示默认 HTTP 处理程序的属性和方法。

span.span: Represents the properties and methods of a default HTTP handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个请求侦听均已通过 Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 配置，并且没有显式绑定适用于请求的扩展时，对象会截获 HTTP 管道中的传入请求。A object intercepts incoming requests in the HTTP pipeline when both request interception has been configured through Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 and no explicit bindings apply to the requested extension. 可以通过 IIS 6.0 中引入的通配符应用程序映射功能设置请求拦截。Request interception can be set up through the wildcard application mapping feature introduced in IIS 6.0. 类实现 接口以提供异步请求处理。The class implements the interface to provide asynchronous request processing. 有关 HTTP 处理程序的一般信息，请参阅 [Http 处理程序和 Http 模块概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398986(v=vs.100))。For general information about HTTP handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398986(v=vs.100)). 此外，有关详细信息，请参阅以下内容：Additionally, for more information see the following: - 有关创建异步 HTTP 处理程序的信息，请参阅 [演练：创建异步 Http 处理程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms227433(v=vs.100))。About creating asynchronous HTTP handlers, see [Walkthrough: Creating an Asynchronous HTTP Handler](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms227433(v=vs.100)). - 有关注册 HTTP 处理程序的信息，请参阅 [如何：注册 Http 处理程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/46c5ddfy(v=vs.100))。About registering HTTP handlers, see [How to: Register HTTP Handlers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/46c5ddfy(v=vs.100)). 类可从类派生 ，以提供对请求的自定义处理。Classes can derive from the class to provide customized handling of requests. 派生自的异步 HTTP 处理程序 可能会重写 方法，以更改处理请求的方式。An asynchronous HTTP handler that is derived from the could override the method to change how requests are processed. 不 使用 ASP.NET 错误。A does not use ASP.NET errors. 使用 IIS 错误或适当 ISAPI 自定义错误机制的现有内容不会更改。Existing content that uses IIS errors or a propriety ISAPI custom error mechanism would work unchanged. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过从类派生来实现自定义 HTTP 处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a customized HTTP handler by deriving from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建异步使用的 HTTP 处理程序时，处理程序必须实现 ASP.NET 异步 调用的异步和 方法。When creating an HTTP handler for asynchronous use, your handler must implement the asynchronous and methods that are called asynchronously by ASP.NET.

exception.span: 处理请求的前提条件未满足，被请求的文件具有 .asp 后缀或请求是通过 POST 发送的。

span.span: The preconditions for processing a request fail and either the requested file has the suffix .asp or the request was sent through POST.

summary.span: 获取要随请求一起传输的请求标头和请求值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of request headers and request values to transfer along with the request.
A containing request headers and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回一个空集合，除非它在派生自类的类中填充 。The property returns an empty collection unless it is populated in a class that is derived from the class. 添加的标头将追加到请求中的标头集合，然后再将请求传递回 (IIS) Internet Information Services。The headers that are added are appended to the collection of headers in the request before passing the request back to Internet Information Services (IIS).

summary.span: 在前提条件阻止 对象处理请求时被调用。

span.span: Called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前提条件由客户端在请求标头字段中指定，并在 Web 服务器上进行评估。Preconditions are specified by the client in the request-header fields and are evaluated on the Web server. 例如，通过使用前提条件，客户端可以防止请求的方法 (例如，将) 应用于所需资源以外的资源。For example, by using preconditions, clients can prevent a requested method (for example, GET) from being applied to a resource other than the one intended. 有关详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (W3C) 网站上的 [超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) 规范中的第14部分 "标头字段定义"。For more information, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site. 当前提条件阻止 对象处理请求时，将调用方法。The method is called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request. 派生类可以重写 方法，以便在前置条件失败时引发异常。A deriving class might override the method to throw an exception when the preconditions fail. 不 会在方法中引发异常 。The does not throw an exception in the method. 以下任何操作都将导致前提条件失败：Any of the following will cause the preconditions to fail: - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 更改响应的缓存策略。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 将 对象作为筛选器添加到 属性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 重写当前请求的目标 URL。

span.span: Overrides the target URL for the current request.

returns.span: 要在请求中使用的被重写的 URL；如果未提供被重写的 URL，则为 。

span.span: The overridden URL to use in the request; or if an overridden URL is not provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回， `null` 除非它在派生自类的类中被重写 。The method returns `null` unless it is overridden in a class that is derived from the class. 仅当 ASP.NET 在 IIS 6.0 上的工作进程隔离模式下运行，并且在调用对象之前未修改响应时，才会调用方法 。The method is called only if ASP.NET is running in worker process isolation mode on IIS 6.0, and if the response was not modified before the object was called. 响应由以下任意内容修改：The response is modified by any of the following: - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 更改响应的缓存策略。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 将 对象作为筛选器添加到 属性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 使 对象能够处理 HTTP Web 请求。

span.span: Enables a object to process of HTTP Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应同步调用此方法。The method should not be called synchronously. 从类派生的类 可以重写， 以提供自定义的请求处理。Classes that are derived from the class can override the to provide customized request processing.

span.span: The is called synchronously.
